verses.verse: תְּ֭פִלָּה <WH8605> A Prayer לְעָנִ֣י <WH6041> of the afflicted כִֽי־ <WH3588> for יַעֲטֹ֑ף <WH5848> when he is overwhelmed וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <WH8210> and poureth out שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ <WH7879> his complaint יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD שִׁמְעָ֣ה <WH8085> Hear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> my prayer וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י <WH7775> and let my cry אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> about תָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> come

אַל־ <WH408> not תַּסְתֵּ֬ר <WH5641> Hide פָּנֶ֨יךָ ׀ <WH6440> not thy face מִמֶּנִּי֮ <WH4480> in בְּי֪וֹם <WH3117> from me in the day צַ֫ר <WH6862> [when] I am in trouble לִ֥י הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> incline אֵלַ֥י <WH413> about אָזְנֶ֑ךָ <WH241> thine ear בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> unto me in the day אֶ֝קְרָ֗א <WH7121> [when] I call מַהֵ֥ר <WH4118> me speedily עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> answer

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָל֣וּ <WH3615> are consumed בְעָשָׁ֣ן <WH6227> like smoke יָמָ֑י <WH3117> For my days וְ֝עַצְמוֹתַ֗י <WH6106> and my bones כְּמוֹ־ <WH4168> as an hearth קֵ֥ד <WH4168> A hearth נִחָֽרוּ׃ <WH2787> are burned

הוּכָּֽה־ <WH5221> is smitten כָ֭עֵשֶׂב <WH6212> like grass וַיִּבַ֣שׁ <WH3001> and withered לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> My heart כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed שָׁ֝כַ֗חְתִּי <WH7911> so that I forget מֵאֲכֹ֥ל <WH398> to eat לַחְמִֽי׃ <WH3899> my bread
מִקּ֥וֹל <WH6963> By reason of the voice אַנְחָתִ֑י <WH585> of my groaning דָּבְקָ֥ה <WH1692> cleave עַ֝צְמִ֗י <WH6106> my bones לִבְשָׂרִֽי׃ <WH1320> to my skin
דָּ֭מִיתִי <WH1819> I am like לִקְאַ֣ת <WH6893> a pelican מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> of the wilderness הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <WH1961> have become כְּכ֣וֹס <WH3563> I am like an owl חֳרָבֽוֹת׃ <WH2723> of the desert
שָׁקַ֥דְתִּי <WH8245> I watch וָאֶֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> have become כְּ֝צִפּ֗וֹר <WH6833> and am as a sparrow בּוֹדֵ֥ד <WH909> alone עַל־ <WH5921> on גָּֽג׃ <WH1406> upon the house top

כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> me all the day חֵרְפ֣וּנִי <WH2778> reproach אוֹיְבָ֑י <WH341> Mine enemies מְ֝הוֹלָלַ֗י <WH1984> [and] they that are mad בִּ֣י נִשְׁבָּֽעוּ׃ <WH7650> against me are sworn

כִּי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֭פֶר <WH665> ashes כַּלֶּ֣חֶם <WH3899> like bread אָכָ֑לְתִּי <WH398> For I have eaten וְ֝שִׁקֻּוַ֗י <WH8249> my drink בִּבְכִ֥י <WH1065> with weeping מָסָֽכְתִּי׃ <WH4537> and mingled

מִפְּנֵֽי־ <WH6440> Because זַֽעַמְךָ֥ <WH2195> of thine indignation וְקִצְפֶּ֑ךָ <WH7110> and thy wrath כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נְ֝שָׂאתַ֗נִי <WH5375> for thou hast lifted me up וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵֽנִי׃ <WH7993> and cast me down
יָ֭מַי <WH3117> My days כְּצֵ֣ל <WH6738> [are] like a shadow נָט֑וּי <WH5186> that declineth וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I כָּעֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> like grass אִיבָֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> and I am withered

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> But thou O LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever תֵּשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> shalt endure וְ֝זִכְרְךָ֗ <WH2143> and thy remembrance לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> unto all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> generations

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You תָ֭קוּם <WH6965> Thou shalt arise תְּרַחֵ֣ם <WH7355> [and] have mercy צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> upon Zion כִּי־ <WH3588> for עֵ֥ת <WH6256> for the time לְ֝חֶֽנְנָ֗הּ <WH2603> to favour כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֥א <WH935> is come מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> her yea the set time

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely רָצ֣וּ <WH7521> take pleasure עֲ֭בָדֶיךָ <WH5650> For thy servants אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבָנֶ֑יהָ <WH68> in her stones וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> עֲפָרָ֥הּ <WH6083> the dust יְחֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH2603> and favour

וְיִֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> shall fear ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> So the heathen אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> and all the kings הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> thy glory
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בָנָ֣ה <WH1129> shall build up יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> When the LORD צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> Zion נִ֝רְאָ֗ה <WH7200> he shall appear בִּכְבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> in his glory

פָּ֭נָה <WH6437> He will regard אֶל־ <WH413> about תְּפִלַּ֣ת <WH8605> the prayer הָעַרְעָ֑ר <WH6199> of the destitute וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not בָ֝זָ֗ה <WH959> and not despise אֶת־ <WH853> תְּפִלָּתָֽם׃ <WH8605> their prayer

תִּכָּ֣תֶב <WH3789> This shall be written זֹ֭את <WH2063> for לְד֣וֹר <WH1755> for the generation אַחֲר֑וֹן <WH314> to come וְעַ֥ם <WH5971> and the people נִ֝בְרָ֗א <WH1254> which shall be created יְהַלֶּל־ <WH1984> shall praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִ֭שְׁקִיף <WH8259> For he hath looked down מִמְּר֣וֹם <WH4791> from the height קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> of his sanctuary יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> did the LORD מִשָּׁמַ֤יִם ׀ <WH8064> from heaven אֶל־ <WH413> upon אֶ֬רֶץ <WH776> the earth הִבִּֽיט׃ <WH5027> behold
לִ֭שְׁמֹעַ <WH8085> To hear אֶנְקַ֣ת <WH603> the groaning אָסִ֑יר <WH615> of the prisoner לְ֝פַתֵּ֗חַ <WH6605> to loose בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> those that are appointed תְמוּתָֽה׃ <WH8546> to death
לְסַפֵּ֣ר <WH5608> To declare בְּ֭צִיּוֹן <WH6726> in Zion שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּ֝תְהִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8416> and his praise בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

בְּהִקָּבֵ֣ץ <WH6908> are gathered עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> When the people יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together וּ֝מַמְלָכ֗וֹת <WH4467> and the kingdoms לַעֲבֹ֥ד <WH5647> to serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
עִנָּ֖ה <WH6031> He weakened בַדֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way [כֹּחֹו כ] (כֹּחִ֗י <WH3581> ability ק) קִצַּ֥ר <WH7114> he shortened יָמָֽי׃ <WH3117> my days

אֹמַ֗ר <WH559> I said אֵלִ֗י <WH410> O my God אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּ֭עֲלֵנִי <WH5927> take me not away בַּחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> in the midst יָמָ֑י <WH3117> of my days בְּד֖וֹר <WH1755> [are] throughout all דּוֹרִ֣ים <WH1755> generations שְׁנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8141> thy years

לְ֭פָנִים <WH6440> Of old הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יָסַ֑דְתָּ <WH3245> hast thou laid the foundation וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> [are] the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> of thy hands שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> and the heavens

הֵ֤מָּה ׀ <WH1992> they יֹאבֵדוּ֮ <WH6> They shall perish וְאַתָּ֪ה <WH859> You תַ֫עֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> but thou shalt endure וְ֭כֻלָּם <WH3605> and all כַּבֶּ֣גֶד <WH899> like a garment יִבְל֑וּ <WH1086> yea all of them shall wax old כַּלְּב֖וּשׁ <WH3830> as a vesture תַּחֲלִיפֵ֣ם <WH2498> shalt thou change וְֽיַחֲלֹֽפוּ׃ <WH2498> them and they shall be changed
וְאַתָּה־ <WH859> You ה֑וּא <WH1931> are the same וּ֝שְׁנוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH8141> But thou [art] the same and thy years לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִתָּֽמּוּ׃ <WH8552> shall have no end

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The children עֲבָדֶ֥יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants יִשְׁכּ֑וֹנוּ <WH7931> shall continue וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם <WH2233> and their seed לְפָנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> before יִכּֽוֹן׃ <WH3559> shall be established
